name: CLICK, COPY, SHOOT
description:
A very quickly thrown together prototype of something I couldn't get out of my head after I saw the TriJam #203 theme "Just Another Copy"

HOW TO PLAY
  • drag player square to move/shoot & release to slow time
  • left click on enemy SQUARES to temporarily copy ability when COPY READY
  • there is a short cooldown before you can copy again
  • shoot BLINKING BALLS for points
  • shoot SQUARE ENEMIES for points 
  • after you die, submit name to leaderboard

DEVELOPMENT

  • Made in 3 hours +  a couple of minutes making sure the leaderboards work
  • Not included in the 3 hours is the 800 hours I crammed in watching YOUTUBE tutorials and beating my head against the wall
  • SFXs made in jfxr

KNOWN ISSUES/BUGS

  • The wall collision is wonky and not finished.
  • The spawning of the enemies needs LOTS of work.
  • Plays fine on mobile BUT your finger covers your square quite a bit.
  • Probably a lot of things I'm forgetting to mention.

Made for Trijam #206 with Gdevelop.

(feedback and comments are always appreciated!)
